results.title: A combination of metformin and insulin improve cardiovascular and cerebrovascular risk factors in individuals with type 1 diabetes mellitus.
results.text_hl: A combination of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ improve cardiovascular @<m>DISEASE_Cerebrovascular_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002561 @@@and cerebrovascular@@@ risk factors in individuals with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_1 @DISEASE_MESH:D003922 @@@type 1 diabetes mellitus@@@.

results.title: Repurposing metformin to treat age-related neurodegenerative disorders and ischemic stroke.
results.text_hl: Additionally, numerous studies have illustrated @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@'s role in @DISEASE_Cerebral_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D002544 @@@ischemic stroke@@@, a @<m>DISEASE_Cerebrovascular_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002561 @@@cerebrovascular disorder@@@ in which the NVU becomes dysfunctional which can lead to permanent life-threatening disabilities.

results.title: Insulin Resistance in Adolescents and Youth With Type 1 Diabetes: A Review of Problems and Solutions
results.text_hl: Thus, although the effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ on glycemic control are variable, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ holds a promising role in having a cardioprotective effect as evidenced from its beneficial effects on @GENE_INS @GENE_3630 @@@insulin@@@ sensitivity, @CHEMICAL_Lipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008055 @@@lipid@@@ profile and markers of early @<m>DISEASE_Cerebrovascular_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002561 @@@vascular dysfunction@@@.

results.title: Metabolic disorder of nutrients-an emerging field in the pathogenesis of preeclampsia.
results.text_hl: Emerging therapies, such as @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Pravastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017035 @@@pravastatin@@@, demonstrate potential in targeting these pathways for prevention and treatment.

results.title: Effects of oral semaglutide on cardiovascular outcomes in individuals with type 2 diabetes and established atherosclerotic cardiovascular disease and/or chronic kidney disease: Design and baseline characteristics of SOUL, a randomized trial.
results.text_hl: At randomization, 70.7% of participants had CAD, 42.3% had @DISEASE_Renal_Insufficiency_Chronic @DISEASE_MESH:D051436 @@@CKD@@@, 21.1% had @<m>DISEASE_Cerebrovascular_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002561 @@@cerebrovascular disease@@@ and 15.7% had symptomatic PAD (categories not mutually exclusive).
